annotation.spannedText: Today a good and safe vaccine is available to every family and all you have to do is to ask your doctor to administer it

classMention.mentionClass: Today a good and safe vaccine is available to every family and all you have to do is to ask your doctor to administer it

annotation.spannedText: parents who now refuse to have their children immunised are putting the lives of those children at risk

classMention.mentionClass: parents who now refuse to have their children immunised are putting the lives of those children at risk

annotation.spannedText: In America, where measles immunisation is compulsory, measles like smallpox, has been virtually wiped out

classMention.mentionClass: In America, where measles immunisation is compulsory, measles like smallpox, has been virtually wiped out

annotation.spannedText: because so many parents refuse, either out of obstinacy or ignorance or fear, to allow their children to be immunised, we still have a hundred thousand cases of measles every year

classMention.mentionClass: because so many parents refuse, either out of obstinacy or ignorance or fear, to allow their children to be immunised, we still have a hundred thousand cases of measles every year

annotation.spannedText: It really is almost a crime to allow your child to go unimmunised

classMention.mentionClass: It really is almost a crime to allow your child to go unimmunised
